node-fresh

HTTP response freshness testing

fresh(req, res)

Check freshness of req and res headers.

When the cache is “fresh” true is returned, otherwise false is returned to indicate that the cache is now stale.

Example:

```js var req = { ‘if-none-match’: ‘tobi’ }; var res = { ‘etag’: ‘luna’ }; fresh(req, res); // => false

var req = { ‘if-none-match’: ‘tobi’ }; var res = { ‘etag’: ‘tobi’ }; fresh(req, res); // => true ```

Installation

$ npm install fresh
